name: A Journey with ephemera
description: Join ephemera on a very short journey through treacherous bogs, spooky mansions, or even outer space: your choice! This small interactive story was designed to be played by the audience during our online reading series event on August 19, 2020: "ephemera 09: Journeys." Now you can play on your own and see what you missed! Written by KT Bryski.
